definition: to dissipate/to squander
to waste/to spend/to consume/to squander/news/(coll.) to delay/to dilly-dally
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
variant of 散[san4]

sentences.english: We extend enormous energy on our anger.
sentences.chinese: 我们耗散了太多的能量在我们的愤怒上。

sentences.english: The first one is a modified critical dissipative Quasi-Geostrophic equation.
sentences.chinese: 第一个是一类修正的临界耗散准地转方程。

sentences.english: We researched into the dissipative characteristic of human auricular points in 40 cases of myopia.
sentences.chinese: 介绍40例近视眼病例的耳穴耗散特性实验研究。

sentences.english: The initial boundary value problem of fourth order wave equation with dispersive and dissipative terms is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究具色散和耗散项的四阶波动方程的初边值问题。

sentences.english: In this chapter, we shall study the depolarizing channel and the lossy channel.
sentences.chinese: 我们将研究退极化通道与耗散通道模型。

sentences.english: The unprimed portions are configured to enable electrostatic dissipation.
sentences.chinese: 非底层部分被构造成能够使静电耗散。

sentences.english: As he showed slides of the ocean floor andexplained that the coast is a system of energy dissipation, the crowdpeppered him with questions.
sentences.chinese: 他用底架构的幻灯片说明海岸线是个能量耗散的系统。

sentences.english: The frictional dissipation will introduce an exponential decay .
sentences.chinese: 摩擦耗散可导致指数式的衰减。

sentences.english: From complementarity principle we build up dissipation mechanics in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中，我们根据互补性原理，建立了耗散力学。

sentences.english: The friction force is therefore called a nonconservative or a dissipative force.
sentences.chinese: 因此，摩擦力称为非保守力或耗散力。

sentences.english: These verified that the agric economic system is a Non-linear dissipation structural complex system.
sentences.chinese: 证明了农业系统是非线性耗散结构的复杂系统。

sentences.english: All of the energy converted is dissipated within the source .
sentences.chinese: 转换来的所有能量都耗散在电源内部。

sentences.english: Does biasing at max dissipation guarantee class A operation?
sentences.chinese: 是否偏置保证在最大耗散A级操作？

sentences.english: Finallly, the scientific idea of the dissipative structure theory is clarified.
sentences.chinese: 最后阐明耗散结构理论的科学思想。

sentences.english: Quadratic- dissipative control for linear discrete-time systems with time-delay is considered in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 考虑线性离散时滞系统的二次型耗散控制问题。

sentences.english: Dissipative structure theory has increasingly important influences on mo-dern sciences and philosophies.
sentences.chinese: 耗散结构理论对当代科学和哲学的影响日益显著。

definition: to waste
damage (e.g. to goods in transit)
wear and tear/to wear away over time
sex fluids
(of sth that should be retained: nutrients, moisture, heat etc) to be lost
bodily fluids (general term in Chinese medicine)
to generate heat
deficiency of kidney essence due to sexual excess (TCM)
to coalesce/to gather together/to amass
to such an extent as to/down to/up to
lust
medical dressing/bandage
exhausted/worn out
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
pathogeny (cause of disease) in TCM/as opposed to vital energy 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4]
disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
